mapper.select: SELECT SR.RES_ID AS RES_ID , SR.RES_NM AS MASTER_NM , SR.RES_TP AS RES_TP , SRD.LANG_TP AS LANG_TP , SRD.RES_NM AS RES_NM FROM SYS_RESOURCE SR INNER JOIN SYS_RESOURCE_DTL SRD ON SR.RES_ID = SRD.RES_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND SR.RES_ID = #{RES_ID}
mapper.sql:
SELECT SR.RES_ID
, SRD.RES_NM
, SR.RES_NM
, SR.RES_TP , TO_CHAR(SR.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT FROM SYS_RESOURCE SR
INNER JOIN SYS_RESOURCE_DTL SRD ON SR.RES_ID = SRD.RES_ID AND SRD.LANG_TP = #{LANG_TP}
WHERE 1 = 1
AND SR.RES_ID LIKE '%' || #{RES_ID} || '%'
AND SR.RES_NM LIKE '%' || #{RES_NM} || '%'
AND SR.RES_ID LIKE #{RES_CATEGORY} || '%'
ORDER BY SR.REG_DT DESC
